description:
neo4j version 4 & 5 port of graphaware neo4j dashboard

revision 2 is for neo4j version 5. It is a Work in progress. some of the metrics from version 4 were not available in version 5

panels.description:
This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.
If the transaction is rolled-back nodes will not be created but will increase this gauge.

Maximum speed is set to 30k nodes/sec
Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine
panels.title: Relationship creation speed (ids)

This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.

panels.description:
Neo4j Checkpoints. 
Checkpointing is the process of flushing all pending page updates from the page cache to the store files
